scopes-declaration.opcuaclient.name: OPC UA Client
scopes-declaration.opcuaclient.descripti: Permissions for the OPC UA Client
scopes-declaration.opcuaclient.view.name: View
scopes-declaration.opcuaclient.view.desc:
- Read access to all OPC UA Client related Data Layer nodes. 
- View web UI with OPC UA Client configurations and states.
scopes-declaration.opcuaclient.operate.d:
- Read access to all OPC UA Client related Data Layer nodes. 
- View web UI with OPC UA Client configurations and states. 
- Write and execute Data Layer nodes for existing OPC UA Client Sessions.
scopes-declaration.opcuaclient.manage.de: Read and Write access to all OPC UA Client related Data Layer nodes.
